languages.text: {n}Священник перед вами производит внушительное впечатление — высокий, мощный, со шрамами на лице и руках. Весь его облик словно рассказывает историю о многочисленных еретиках, повстречавших конец при встрече с адептом истинной веры.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник перед вами производит внушительное впечатление — это высокий, мощный мужчина, на лице и руках которого видны многочисленные шрамы. Весь его вид словно рассказывает историю о многочисленных еретиках, повстречавших конец при встрече с адептом истинной веры.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Священник перед вами производит внушительное впечатление — высокий, мощный, со шрамами на лице и руках. Весь его облик словно рассказывает историю о многочисленных еретиках, повстречавших конец при встрече с адептом истинной веры.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He's tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of true faith.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}你面前这位牧师看起来非常威严。他身材高大，肌肉发达，脸上和手臂上到处都是伤疤。他整个人都像是无声地诉说着他的过去——无数异端分子都死在了这位真正虔诚之人的手中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前这位牧师看起来非常威严。他身材高大，肌肉发达，脸上和手臂上到处都是伤疤。他整个人都像是无声地诉说着他的过去——无数异端分子都死在了这位真正虔诚之人的手中。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}あなたの目の前にいる牧師は、印象的だ。背が高く筋肉質で、顔や腕に傷がついていた。大勢の異端者が、この真の信仰の信奉者の前で人生を終えたんだと、そう物語っているような容姿をしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの目の前にいる牧師は、印象的だ。背が高く筋肉質で、顔や腕に傷がついていた。大勢の異端者が、この真の信仰の信奉者の前で人生を終えたんだと、そう物語っているような容姿をしていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote que tienes delante tiene aspecto imponente. Es alto y musculoso, con cicatrices en la cara y los brazos. Su aspecto es el mismo que el de muchos herejes que se redimieron gracias a la fe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote que tienes delante tiene aspecto imponente. Es alto y musculoso, con cicatrices en la cara y los brazos. Su aspecto es el mismo que el de muchos herejes que se redimieron gracias a la fe.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der Priester vor dir sieht äußerst imposant aus. Er ist groß und muskulös und hat Narben auf Gesicht und Armen. Seine ganze Erscheinung scheint die Geschichte vieler Ketzer zu erzählen, die bei einer Begegnung mit diesem Anhänger des wahren Glaubens ihr Ende gefunden haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester vor dir sieht äußerst imposant aus. Er ist groß und muskulös und hat Narben auf Gesicht und Armen. Seine ganze Erscheinung scheint die Geschichte vieler Ketzer zu erzählen, die bei einer Begegnung mit diesem Anhänger des wahren Glaubens ihr Ende gefunden haben.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Le prêtre qui se tient devant vous est particulièrement grand et musclé, et son visage est bardé de cicatrices. Tout en lui raconte l'histoire des nombreux hérétiques qui n'ont pas survécu à leur rencontre avec cet adepte dont la ferveur n'a d'égale que l'austérité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêtre qui se tient devant vous est particulièrement grand et musclé, et son visage est bardé de cicatrices. Tout en lui raconte l'histoire des nombreux hérétiques qui n'ont pas survécu à leur rencontre avec cet adepte dont la ferveur n'a d'égale que l'austérité.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Önündeki rahibin oldukça heybetli bir görünüşü var. Uzun boylu, kaslı, yüzünde ve kollarında bir sürü yara izi bulunuyor. Görünüşü; sayısız kâfirin, gerçek inancın bu savunucusunun ellerinde can verdiğini düşündürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest in front of you looks imposing. He is tall and muscular, and has scars on his face and arms. His whole appearance seems to tell a story of many heretics who met their end at the hands of this adherent of the true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki rahibin oldukça heybetli bir görünüşü var. Uzun boylu, kaslı ve yüzünde ve kollarında bir sürü yara izi bulunuyor. Görünüşü, sayısız kâfirin, gerçek inancın bu savunucusunun ellerinde can verdiğine dair hikâyeler anlatıyor gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
